item.description:
In the first of what we intend to be monthly meetings held jointly with the Green Streets organization, we have invited members of the Portland Bicycle/Pedestrian Advisory Committee to come and talk about who they are and what they are doing to improve the pedestrian and bicycle experience in Portland. The Bike/Ped Committee is a voluntary and self-selected group of citizens who advocate and educate on bicycle, transit and pedestrian issues, including handicap accessibility.

Please come and bring your questions and concerns about what is being done to make Portland a nicer place to walk and bike, what more might be done, and how you can get involved!
item.name: Meet the Portland Bike/Ped Committee
